#define PASSVERT (   index)
Value:
{                       \
    if (shademodel == GL_SMOOTH) {              \
        short *no = mvert[index].no;            \
        glNormal3sv(no);                        \
    }                                           \
    glVertex3fv(mvert[index].co);   \
}
